Desc.ENU: Reinforcement cannot be designed. The position of reinforcement layers does not match the thickness of the member.

Sol.ENU: Decrease the concrete cover or increase the thickness of the 2D member.

Desc.ENU: Reinforcement cannot be designed. Internal forces are zero.
The applied provided reinforcement is not sufficient for some of the layers (As,prov < As,req).

Sol.ENU: Increase the amount of the basic or additional reinforcement.

Desc.ENU: The applied provided reinforcement exceeds the maximum limit (As,prov > As,max).

Sol.ENU: Increase the thickness of the member or the quality of used materials.

Desc.ENU: The user-defined concrete cover is not sufficient for some of the surfaces (cuser < cnom).

Sol.ENU: Increase the concrete cover or switch the method for the determination of the cover to 'Auto'.

Desc.ENU: The resistance of the virtual concrete strut is exhausted.

Sol.ENU: Change reinforcement geometry or increase the thickness of the member.

Desc.ENU: The designed required reinforcement exceeds the maximum limit (As,req > As,max).

Sol.ENU: Increase the thickness of the member or the quality of used materials.

Desc.ENU: Punching shear resistance at the column perimeter (vRd,max) is not sufficient acc. to ยง6.4.3(2).

Sol.ENU: Increase the column size or change plate properties (use higher grade of concrete material or increase the thickness).
